General.Name: Mota-Engil SGPS SA
General.Description: Mota-Engil, SGPS, S.A. offers public and private construction work and related activities in Europe, Africa, and Latin America. It is involved in the construction of infrastructure projects, including airports, railways, hydraulic, ports, urban, and roads; agricultural and industrial, public buildings, offices and trade, housing, industrial, buildings rehabilitation, and silos and chimneys; and offices and housing related projects. The company also offers municipal solid waste and industrial waste collection and treatment; urban cleaning; and used oils recycling, mechanical treatment and biological waste, and energy and organic waste recovery activities, as well as offers environmental education services. In addition, it manages water supply systems; operates port terminals; operates road and rail terminals; transports goods by rail; provides integrated logistics services; and holds water and sanitation concessions. Further, the company is involved in the rehabilitation of pipelines; design, construction, and maintenance of green spaces and golf courses; buildings and facilities maintenance; landscape architecture; provision of tourism services; and finishing of mail and direct mail activities, as well as designs, constructs, and manages transport infrastructures. Additionally, it engages in the real estate development, and purchase and sale of real estate; exploitation and processing of minerals; human resource management in mining; extraction of gravel, sand, and crushed stone; design, construction, management, and exploitation of parking lots; production of hydroelectricity and thermal energy; sea and air transport; and provision of consulting services. Mota-Engil, SGPS, S.A. was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in Porto, Portugal.
